title: Remove a File from the Last Commit
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes in their codebase. One of the common tasks in Git is to remove a file from the last commit. This can be useful when you accidentally added a file to the last commit that you didn't intend to include.

meta.title: Git Tutorials | Remove File from Last Commit
meta.description: Learn how to remove a file from the last commit in a Git repository without changing the commit message. Improve your Git skills and version control workflow.
meta.keywords: Git, version control, remove file, last commit, commit message, tutorial, programming

steps.title: Remove a File from the Last Commit

verify.name: Verify for successful removal
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 从最后一次提交中移除文件
i18n.description: Git是一个强大的版本控制系统，它允许开发者追踪代码库中的变更。在Git中，一项常见的任务是从最后一次提交中移除某个文件。当你不小心将一个本不打算包含的文件添加到最后一次提交中时，这会很有用。

meta.title: Git教程 | 从最后一次提交中移除文件
meta.description: 学习如何在不更改提交消息的情况下，从Git仓库的最后一次提交中移除文件。提升你的Git技能和版本控制工作流程。
meta.keywords: Git, 版本控制, 移除文件, 最后一次提交, 提交消息, 教程, 编程

steps.title: 从最后一次提交中移除文件

verify.name: 验证移除是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
